    Current Research Interests

    Reduced Order Modeling

    Application of projection-based reduced-order modeling techniques to challenging multiscale multiphysics simulations

    Model reduction algorithm and methods development

    Nonlinear manifold learning techniques

    Read More

    Uncertainty Quantification

    Uncertainty propagation in large-scale networks

    Stochastic partial differential equations

    Read More

    Computational Heat Transfer

    Large-scale high-fidelity simulations of complex engineered systems

    Numerical methods

    Multiphysics coupling

    Eulerian and Lagrangian methods for multiphase flows
